WorkItem.Description:
Hi, thank you for providing great instruction of APS.NET MVC 2!

Now I'm on page 103 and am trying to see validation error message.
I created meta data class as just explained in pdf.
But when I leave title field blank and click "Save", it shows Japanese localized message not the string I set in meta data class.
(Please see attached screen shot. The string means "Value '' is invalid.")
I'm using Japanese version of VisualStudio2010. Is this the reason?
How can I display the string I specify in meta data class?
